name: Small Little Viking
description:
This little viking kid stole Odin's magic helmet, use it to channel the power of the gods and climb the mountain!

Made in two weeks for a small student project, where the objective was to make a mobile puzzle game.

Controls:
- Move to an adjacent tile : tap on it.
- Change view : Double tap on either side of the screen.
- Borrow a divine power : tap a totem while being next to it.
- Use the Thunder power : Tap enemies (to smite them) or crystals (to toggle them) while being next to them.
- Use the Ice Slide power : Press and release from the viking kid to the direction you want to slide towards.
- Use the Earthquake power : Tap on the viking kid.
